title: Media from Delpher in Wikimedia Commons - Usage of copyright templates, grouped by reason

description.intro:
This chart shows how often which copyright templates are used in Wikimedia Commons media files that were sourced from Delpher.(*). The bars are grouped by the main reason why the files are in the public domain. The template usage is taken "as observed" (***).

Key figures:
- Total number of distinct media files: {total_unique_files:,} (**)
- Total number of template usages: {total_template_usages:,} (one file can contain multiple copyright templates)
- Total number of distinct templates used: {unique_templates_used}

Data as of 9 April 2025.
description.source-name: KB, national library of the Netherlands
description.aria-description: This chart shows how often which copyright templates are used in Wikimedia Commons media files that were sourced from Delpher. The bars are grouped by the main reason why the files are in the public domain. Total number of distinct media files = {total_unique_files:,}. Total number of template usages = {total_template_usages:,} (one file can contain multiple copyright templates). Total number of distinct templates used = {unique_templates_used}. Data as of 9 April 2025.

categoryOrder: Government work not subject to copyright

text-annotations.text: Example: The copyright template {{PD-old-70}} is used 734 times across 6,249 files. It indicates that a work is in the public domain in its country of origin and other countries and areas where the copyright term is the author's life plus 70 years or fewer.

annotate.notes:
(*) Media files in Category:Media from Delpher
(**) This chart and its underlying data exclude any files that are also in the Category:Scans from the Internet Archive. See for instance this excluded example that falls in both categories.
(***) The template usage is taken 'as observed', ie. without further assessment, judgement or corrections. This means that the usage of these templates in the {total_unique_files:,} Wikimedia Commons files has not been checked for correctness or completeness, nor have any files been adapted in case public domain claims were false or inconsistent.
